column1: #text=As I waited , I gathered my ingredients : butter , flour , baking powder , salt , sugar , eggs , and heavy cream .
#text=I mixed all the ingredients together in a large bowl with a large spoon , following a recipe I found in a cookbook .
#text=I greased a cake pan with butter and flour so the cake would n't stick then poured the batter inside .
#text=I put the cake pan in the oven for approximately 30 minutes .
#text=I watched the cake closely in the oven .
#text=Once it turned lightly golden grown on top , I tested the center .
#text=Once the center was the correct firmness -- not too hard , not too soft -- I removed the cake .
#text=I let the cake cool for 10 minutes in order to allow it to solidify .
#text=I used a knife around it 's edge to separate it from the pan then removed the cake onto parchment paper .
